Articles.Content: I'm looking for a mod that will add a toolbar that I can click and it'll either pop up a small window or a drop down menu that I can select a specific ship. I do extensive ground ops on various planets (20+ separate ships/rovers at any given time) and its a pain in the butt to have to hit [ or ] over and over again until I get to the rover or ship I want to move. Thanks.
Haysack is what you are looking for

Haysack is what you are looking for

Reading the thread of that mod, latest update is 0.22 (confirmed working in 0.23). I'm on 0.90 and the thread is locked. This is exactly what in looking for. Can anyone confirm if it works in 0.90?
